channel.title: Help on making a NPC move or be removed in quests [Delta]
channel.description: Was wondering how I would either make a NPC move during a quest, such as Gurtrude's Cat Fluffs, or make one show only up to a point in a quest, then be gone afterwards. Any help on it would be greatly appreciated. I have been trying out the NPC handler.java, and though a lot of things in there I completely get and have been using, but my attempts have not been successful. :D Could someone point me in the right direction?
